title: Happy Birthday Dipsy!
msg: Welcome to your special day! 22 looks absolutely stunning on you.

title: Your Kindness
msg: You have a heart of gold that touches everyone around you.

title: Your Smile
msg: Your smile lights up the darkest rooms. Just seeing you happy makes my day.

title: Your Laughter
msg: The sound of your laugh is pure joy. It reminds me of this classic.

title: Your Support
msg: Thank you for always standing by my side. You are my rock.

title: You're Gorgeous
msg: Inside and out, you are breathtaking. A total rockstar.

title: Your Mind
msg: I love how you think. You have a fire in you.

title: Our Adventures
msg: Every moment with you is a new journey.

title: My Comfort
msg: You feel like home. You bring peace to my chaos.

title: Your Patience
msg: You handle everything with such grace.

title: Your Style
msg: Effortlessly cool. You rock every look.

title: Your Strength
msg: I've seen you handle challenges like a warrior.

title: Your Eyes
msg: I could get lost in them forever.

title: Your Voice
msg: Listening to you is my favorite thing.
song: Pee Loon - Once Upon A Time

title: Our Memories
msg: We've built so many memories, classic ones.

title: Our Future
msg: Thinking about the future is exciting with you.

title: Your Hugs
msg: Your hugs are the best medicine.

title: My Inspiration
msg: You inspire me to be a better person every single day.

title: Our Love Story
msg: Every day with you feels like a movie.

title: Best Friend
msg: Above all, you are my best friend.

title: Everything
msg: You are my everything. My sun, my moon, and all my stars.

title: Feeling 22
msg: Happy Birthday Dipsy! I don't know about you, but I hope you're feeling 22!
